order to draw a system context diagram you need to answer these questions what's the scope of the system we are
documenting or designing or describing so what features sit inside the system boundary and what features sit outside
of this is of the system boundary in other systems in the environment who is using the system so who are the roles
the actors the users the personas what sort of things are they doing and what system integration points do we need to
support okay so if you can answer those questions you can draft up a system context diagram so this is a system
